channel.title: Unban Javafire
channel.description:
Hello there Moparscape, it's been a while since my last account. :palm: Anyways unban me, i'm no threat, and i need a place to get my resources for java programming. I promise at least 10 new tutorials on how to run web-clients, servers, and vps' within the next month.
If you decide to re-ban my then just know that i would like to know why. I mean really i asked to be banned as Javafire, evaded a couple times, and should at least be able to come back since it really was all a bunch of bullshit to begin with.
Reason for ban: 10,000 antivirus. Reason for unban: Admitting the antivirus isn't real and that i was talking about websense but was too ignorant to understand this at the time
For those of you who don't know me, i'm a former veteran member, troll, and often help people out on here allot.

item.title: Unban Javafire
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

First of all, ban appeals don’t happen through forum threads. We don’t take into account the public opinion when we consider an unban. I have read through the thread that was specifically created about you and in my opinion it would be premature to unban you.

You can of course feel free to appeal this through the administrators, but do not make any further topics on the matter. Join the IRC and try and catch one of them online.

Read full topic

item.title: Unban Javafire
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

You did way to much stupid shit while you were here to warrant getting unbanned.

Read full topic

item.title: Unban Javafire
item.dc:creator: @Java-Fire Java-Fire
item.description:
@Java-Fire wrote:

just wanted to get the community opinion, and i was 15 so i was arrogant and stupid at the time. Anyways my whole intention was to do that after this anyways thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Unban Javafire
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Java-Fire:

this is faster and plus i like to have public opinion.

and the exact opposite of what you should do… Stay banned jackass.

Read full topic

item.title: Unban Javafire
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I’m sure the administration would be more than glad to consider unbanning(if they so desire) you but you need to go through the proper procedures first.

Read full topic

item.title: Unban Javafire
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

Oh god, don’t unban him. I don’t even know who you are but you sound annoying.

Read full topic

item.title: Unban Javafire
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

I’m not sure the public opinion will be in your favour, especially since you’re coming off as really pushy. Why not just use the new account you have for resources, what good would your old account do you if you’re just browsing? Obviously if the staff on the forum banned you it wasn’t because the reason was “bullshit” but because you were a problem within the community.

TinyScape is right, PMing a admin or mod would have been a more practical approach.

Read full topic

item.title: Unban Javafire
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Remember when you threatened to hack and ddos me if I didnt unban you

good times, good times

Read full topic
